content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), small-electric-pole(position x=3.5, y=0.5), and pipe connections to offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0) with coal fuel
- Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0) with coal fuel
- Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0) with coal fuel

### Lab at position(x= unknown)
Consists of lab entity with automation research and small-electric-pole connection

### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of offshore pump entity with pipe connections to steam engine at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity accepts the item being inserted
- Check if the entity has available space for the item
- Verify the entity is an instance of Entity or EntityGroup before inserting items

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible for connection
- Check if the connection points are valid and available
- Verify the fluid system is properly set up for pipe connections

### Errors when using neighbours
- Ensure the neighbours are valid entities or EntityGroups
- Check if the neighbours are properly connected to the entity
- Verify the neighbours are accessible and not nil

### Errors when using get_entity
- Ensure the entity exists at the specified position
- Check if the entity is an instance of Entity or EntityGroup
- Verify the entity is properly initialized before use
